duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative service support by assisting customers with billing questions, policy changes, rate changes, and discounts.
Communicate with internal and external customers about underwriting guidelines, policies, and marketing initiatives to service customer accounts.
Proactively share knowledge with customers and provide a positive customer experience.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account related questions from customers.
Attain performance level standards as outlined in performance objectives.
Identify and suggest innovative process changes to support business practices.
Respond to customer inquiries through appropriate mediums.
Hold expert knowledge of company products, services, and strategies across multiple lines of insurance.
Consistently meet or exceed performance measurement goals.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four year college degree preferred. Completion of required additional training.
